long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps to distinct new content from watched, like focus mode 

Whenever you should search an image or just browsing, this extension will check if image that you're watching is new. Old images are masked with alpha and warning label is shown (Watched before 1,2,3 mins ...). You can toggle between focus mode and normal browsing by clicking the extension button on navigation bar.

Privacy assurance

Information about your image history are never transmitted or disclosed to either the Hidery developers or any other party. 

Additional Benefits

You can use this extension to track when lastly have seen an image.
